name: ScaryMonster
0:
”Alexa Open Scary Monster”
”Alexa Play Scary Monster”
”Alexa Start Scary Monster”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: scary monster
des:
**** WARNING - very scary!!!! ****

Each time you open this skill you will hear a different, TERRIFYING, monster!

To ensure authentic scariness, the author of this skill, recorded REAL scary monsters, at great personal risk to himself.

If you have any issues, or find any bugs, please email me at animal.letters@gmail.com

More fun?
-----------------
Why not try:
“Alexa enable Bounty Hunter"
”Alexa open Monster Madness”
“Alexa open Yes Majesty”
"Alexa open Space Express"
“Alexa open Stinky Pinky”
“Alexa open Animal Letters”
“Alexa open Feel the Pressure”
“Alexa open Challenge America”
"Alexa open Face the Music"
“Alexa enable Hocus Pocus”
“Alexa open the Daily Connection”
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
